char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My spell appears to be off. I'm praying to God that my hair will grow back.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm going to cut my hair back to the length it was before this incident. I can give it to you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's what I was thinking about doing.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll use it to construct a wig that will restore my former glory.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I hope you'll be happy with my gift.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I also just thought about keratin vitamins...

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Other than a scarlet mist, spring snow, and even an eternal night, I may have seen other incidents.
